activities:
eCurator collects certain data from its customers, including their email address, name, city of residence, Skype name, driver's license information, gender, age, and time zone in which they reside. That information is used to register accounts on the website and to connect "Questioners" with other users who offer services, called "Curators". 
Billing information is only collected through third party payment processors, such as PayPal.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
